category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Vis_SendViewToSMTempFolder
preference.preference_description: Defines the name of the Teamcenter folder where the transient Product View dataset is stored while sending a 3D view from Teamcenter Visualization to Rich Client Structure Manager viewer. The temporary Product View dataset is removed after it is applied in the Structure Manager viewer.
